```
VAR
    refAirConditioning : REFERENCE TO FB_AirConditioning;
END_VAR

IF __ISVALIDREF(refAirConditioning) THEN
    refAirConditioning.bActive := FALSE;
END_IF
```

```
VAR
    byCurrentLevel : BYTE := 0;
END_VAR

IF byCurrentLevel <> byLevel THEN
    byCurrentLevel := byLevel;
END_IF
```

```
VAR
	refCDPlayer : REFERENCE TO FB_CDPlayer;
END_VAR

METHOD Execute
VAR
	refCDPlayer : REFERENCE TO FB_CDPlayer;
END_VAR

IF (__ISVALIDREF(THIS^.refCDPlayer)) THEN
	THIS^.refCDPlayer.Stop();
END_IF
```

```
VAR
    refSocket : REFERENCE TO FB_Socket;
END_VAR

IF __ISVALIDREF(refSocket) THEN
    refSocket.Off();
END_IF
```

```
VAR
    refSocket : REFERENCE TO FB_Socket;
END_VAR

METHOD Execute
VAR
END_VAR
IF (__ISVALIDREF(THIS^.refSocket)) THEN
    THIS^.refSocket.bActive := TRUE;
END_IF
```
